name: Qingxin
desc: A translucent white flower that only grows on the highest stone peaks. It eschews the warmth and moisture of the plains to gaze out afar from the solitary mountaintops.

customize.name: Qingxin Seed
customize.desc: A seed obtained from the Seed Dispensary. A quality seed full of life, just waiting to be planted in the fields of the Realm Within. After some time, it will grow into a Qingxin.

customize.name: Herbalist Gui
customize.desc: A pharmacist who works under Baizhu. He creates and sells medicines at Bubu Pharmacy.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Babak
customize.desc: A researcher and the manager of the largest imported goods shop in Port Ormos. It is under the direct management of the Akademiya.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Shenhe
customize.desc: An adepti disciple with a most unusual air about her. Having spent much time cultivating in isolation in Liyue's mountains, she has become every bit as cool and distant as the adepti themselves.

customize.name: Xiao
customize.desc: A yaksha adeptus who defends Liyue. Also heralded as the "Conqueror of Demons" and "Vigilant Yaksha."

customize.name: Ganyu
customize.desc: The secretary at Yuehai Pavilion. The blood of the qilin, an illuminated beast, flows within her veins.

customize.name: Jade Fruit Soup
customize.desc: A traditional Liyue dessert. The water is brought to boil, various ingredients are added in, and then it is simmered for some time before rock sugar is added. The liquid mixture is then simmered until clear and thick. The lengthy simmering creates a soup with a gentle mouthfeel, causing the ingredients to melt with just a light sip. Suitable for all ages.

customize.name: Sunsettia
customize.desc: A plump fruit, beautiful like the sunset, that is abundant across all of Teyvat. It has a curious, sweet aroma and is able to energize an individual.

customize.name: Sugar
customize.desc: A seasoning derived from Sweet Flowers. Has the power to give both energy and happiness.

customize.name: Qingxin
customize.desc: A translucent white flower that only grows on the highest stone peaks. It eschews the warmth and moisture of the plains to gaze out afar from the solitary mountaintops.

customize.name: Violetgrass
customize.desc: A small flower with strong vitality. It is said that its downward-blooming flower keeps its fragrance from dissipating.

customize.name: Heat-Quelling Soup
customize.desc: Baizhu's specialty. "This isn't actually medicine, merely something that can alleviate dryness." As Baizhu's concerned voice echoes in your ears, a bowl of lustrous fruit soup greets your gaze. "This dish didn't use to have sugar, but he was worried that you wouldn't be used to the bitter taste, so he added some to it," added Changsheng.

customize.name: Sunsettia
customize.desc: A plump fruit, beautiful like the sunset, that is abundant across all of Teyvat. It has a curious, sweet aroma and is able to energize an individual.

customize.name: Sugar
customize.desc: A seasoning derived from Sweet Flowers. Has the power to give both energy and happiness.

customize.name: Violetgrass
customize.desc: A small flower with strong vitality. It is said that its downward-blooming flower keeps its fragrance from dissipating.

customize.name: Fruity Duet
customize.desc: A dual-flavored fruity beverage. Add a thick layer of pulp at the bottom and then pour in a smoothie made out of juice and tea. Its layered flavors of fresh fruit are so tempting that no one is able to refuse the drink.

customize.name: Sunsettia
customize.desc: A plump fruit, beautiful like the sunset, that is abundant across all of Teyvat. It has a curious, sweet aroma and is able to energize an individual.

customize.name: Jam
customize.desc: A gelatinous substance made from fruit and sugar. Even a little bit can easily wake up tired taste buds.

customize.name: Qingxin
customize.desc: A translucent white flower that only grows on the highest stone peaks. It eschews the warmth and moisture of the plains to gaze out afar from the solitary mountaintops.

customize.name: Sugar
customize.desc: A seasoning derived from Sweet Flowers. Has the power to give both energy and happiness.

customize.name: Fruity Smoothie
customize.desc: A beverage with simple colors. The smoothie made out of fruit-flavored yogurt has been arranged to resemble the blue sky and white clouds. At the bottom is a thick layer of jelly and finely-cut fruit. The revitalizing flavor makes this beverage the best choice in the summer.

customize.name: Berry
customize.desc: Small, brightly-colored fruit. They can be found everywhere, and the taste of them wipes the fatigue of a long journey away.

customize.name: Milk
customize.desc: Sweet and fragrant cow's milk. Don't waste a single drop, not even that one rolling down your chin.

customize.name: Qingxin
customize.desc: A translucent white flower that only grows on the highest stone peaks. It eschews the warmth and moisture of the plains to gaze out afar from the solitary mountaintops.

customize.name: Sugar
customize.desc: A seasoning derived from Sweet Flowers. Has the power to give both energy and happiness.

customize.name: Tianshu Meat
customize.desc: A braised meat dish. The cut of meat used is a happy medium between lean and fatty, and has been braised to smoking perfection. The ingredients glisten, and are soft but not greasy. Word has it that the Tianshu of a certain generation of the Liyue Qixing invented this dish after much painstaking development.

customize.name: Raw Meat
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Sugar
customize.desc: A seasoning derived from Sweet Flowers. Has the power to give both energy and happiness.

customize.name: Qingxin
customize.desc: A translucent white flower that only grows on the highest stone peaks. It eschews the warmth and moisture of the plains to gaze out afar from the solitary mountaintops.

customize.name: Matsutake
customize.desc: A rare fungus that generally grows on or near pine trees. Its delicate aroma gives away its location.

value.text:
Found in the heights of stone forests
Recommendation: Found in Jueyun Karst
